  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/545</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/545</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">El medi ambient a Catalunya i a les regions d'Europa</string>
            <string language="en">The environment in Catalonia and the regions of Europe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Umgebung in Katalonien und die Regionen von 
Europa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'environnement en Catalogne et les régions de 
l'Europe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O ambiente em Catalonia e as regiões de Europa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'ambiente in Catalogna e le regioni di Europa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το περιβάλλον στην Καταλωνία και τις περιοχές της 
Ευρώπης</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Crèdit interdisciplinar d'anglès i ciències experimentals amb 120 hores de treball sobre educació medioambiental. Conté 10 unitats amb apartats en català, anglès i en alguns casos metodologia experimental. (Sinera 2000)</string>
            <string language="en">Interdisciplinary experimental science credit in English with 120 hours on environmental education. It is made up of 10 units with sections in Catalan, English and in some cases, experimental methodology. (Sinera 2000)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">ciències de la terra</string>
            <string language="en">earth sciences</string>
            <string language="es">ciencias de la tierra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">medi ambient</string>
            <string language="en">environment</string>
            <string language="es">medio ambiente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">educació medi ambiental</string>
            <string language="en">environmental education</string>
            <string language="es">educación ambiental</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">multilingüisme</string>
            <string language="en">multilingualism</string>
            <string language="es">multilingüismo</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interdisziplinäre experimentelle Wissenschaft 
Gutschrift auf englisch mit 120 Stunden auf Klimaausbildung. Sie
besteht 10 Maßeinheiten mit Kapiteln auf katalanisch, Englisch und in
einigen Fällen, experimentelle Methodenlehre. (Sinera 2000)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Degré de solvabilité expérimental interdisciplinaire de la 
science en anglais avec 120 heures sur l'éducation environnementale. 
Elle se compose de 10 unités avec des sections dans le catalan,
l'anglais et dans certains cas, méthodologie expérimentale. 
(Sinera 2000)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Crédito experimental interdisciplinary da ciência
em inglês com 120 horas na instrução ambiental. É composta 
de 10 unidades com as seções no catalan, inglês e em alguns casos, 
metodologia experimental. (Sinera 2000)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Accreditamento sperimentale interdisciplinare di 
scienza in inglese con 120 ore su formazione ambientale. Si 
compone di 10 unità con le sezioni nel catalan, inglese ed in alcuni 
casi, la metodologia sperimentale. (Sinera 2000)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διεπιστημονική πειραματική πίστωση επιστήμης στα 
αγγλικά με 120 ώρες στην περιβαλλοντική εκπαίδευση. 
Αποτελείται από 10 μονάδες με τα τμήματα στα καταλανικά, 
αγγλικά και σε μερικές περιπτώσεις, πειραματική μεθοδολογία. 
(Sinera 2000)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geowissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Umgebung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Klimaausbildung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mehrsprachigkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">sciences de la terre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">environnement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">éducation environnementale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">multilinguisme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ciências de terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ambiente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">instrução ambiental</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">multilingualism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">scienze della terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ambiente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">formazione ambientale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">plurilinguismo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γήινες επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πολυγλωσσία</string>
          </keyword>
